message.content:
I need to identify the value of carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold would be "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This represents the cost of inventory items that were sold to customers during the reporting period.

In the given income statement, I can see:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 3175000.00 (dated 2024-01-28)

This is the value I need to extract as the carrying amount of inventories sold.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3175000.00'} }
```
